artist: Arthur Szyk; K. Bileski; Herman Jaffe
creditline: Gift of Richard Simmons in memory of David and Natalie Simmons
description: very detailed composite image; elaborate borders with scrolls, Stars of David, and black bands with gold imagery; soldier in border at center left; old man at center right in border, with skulls at his feet; contemporary solider with gun and farmer with shovel and grapes at bottom flank two vertical tablets with Hebrew inscriptions; portraits of two men in top corners in border--man at left has stringed instrument, man at right has document; three figures at top center--two men flanking an old man in a white garment; central blue Star of David with yellow grapes at center, surmounted with crown and scrolls; "ISRAEL" below Hebrew inscription below central star
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed LRC in the image, in pink: [ARTHUR SZYK, NEW (ille
title: Title Page for the State of Israel
